overview: Produced to enhance the welfare of captive parrots, this 80-minute DVD is intended for their entertainment and enjoyment. You may catch yourself mesmerized as well by wild parrots from around the world going about their business â€” flying, feeding, preening, and carrying on. Gorgeous footage, a must-have for your feathered friends. All World Parrot Trust proceeds benefit parrot conservation
title: Strictly for Parrots
